ygData.subject: Is The Journey To LVL 23 Worth IT!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello my fellow Shadow Knights, I am a Dark Elf, LVL 19, and i have a question for u LVL 22 s and above.  My question is,  Do we SK s become very powerful at
ygData.messageBody:
Hello my fellow Shadow Knights,

I am a Dark Elf, LVL 19, and i have a question for u LVL 22's and above. My
question is, "Do we SK's become very powerful at LVL 22?" The reason that
i ask this is because i've heard a few people say that if u hold on and keep
playing and hit lvl 22 that u won't be disappointed. As of right now i
basically am a weak warrior with a few weak spells. Do our spells improve
greatly? I sure hope so, because from what i've been told SK's are one of
the strongest high lvl classes there is... so let me know something u higher
lvl players!!!

One last question... Which is better using a 2H Slashing weapon our using a
1H Slashing Weapon with bash? Hehe, and don't tell me it depends on the
weapon... my question is overall.... Just wondering because if 2H Slashing
is better then I'll have to start lvling it up..

Thanks Brothers,

Arikor
-----Original Message-----
From: Shanti Ashtangi <zealpath@...>
To: shadowknight@onelist.com <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 29, 1999 6:41 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Even more on ebw...


>From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Tony Donatelli [mailto:d1ng0@...]
>Sent: July 29, 1999 4:38 AM
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Even more on ebw...
>
>
>First off, no, there is no way in hell that your party of 20s or 22s can
>kill Arlena. She is in Mistmoore and she is a gyspy. Getting to Mistmoore
is
>a slight pain unless you can teleport over somewhere near there (and back).
>Arlena is at least level 30. I say this because even the UNNAMED gyspy
>musicians in Mistmoore are level 30, and they all can CHARM quite well. So,
>be careful.
>
>Dekam N'Tazi may very well be in Neriak. N'Tazi sounds like a dark elf name
>anyway. It was an assumption of mine he would be in Qeynos (cuz almost all
>the quests in the west have something to do with Qeynos). If the site says
>he's in Neriak, he's in Neriak. Come to think of it, that's actually a GOOD
>thing. ;)
>
>DV
>
>The reason I said that was because a 23 shaman I was grouped with the other
>day told me that she was yellow to him (1 or 2 levels up) whether or not he
>was lying is up in the air, but that's the only reason I said that. I
>haven't seen her, and I wish someone who has could give us the real lowdown
>on her.
>And yes it would be nice if Dekam is in Neriak, as I don't think Queynos
has
>an easy to sneak into sewer system (but I know nothing about that).
>If someone out there has done this quest please post everything you know
>about it please hehe
>
